overview: Sakay sa Hangin (Wind-blown) focuses on the life of a peaceful tribal man in Bukidnon, Mindanao. A Talaandig master player and maker of traditional musical instruments, he has a family of seven to support and a world in decay to save. Guided by his dreams, he starts a contagious tune to heal the land and to inspire the lost children-of-the-tribe in our hearts back to the flow of natural law.
title: Sakay sa Hangin
